titles.title: To honor Larry Holmes for his career and community service on the 35th anniversary of his winning the WBC World Heavyweight Title.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary: 6/6/2013--Introduced. Honors Larry Holmes, on the 35th anniversary of his WBC World Heavyweight Championship victory, for his stellar boxing career and community service.
